Title: Drug Testing
Plot: Dwight plays the role of Volunteer Sheriff after finding half a joint in the Dunder Mifflin parking lot leading to an investigation. Pam gives Jim a play challenge where he must be silent until he gives Pam a can of Coke.
GuestStars: Creed Bratton, Hugh Dane, Mindy Kaling, Paul Lieberstein, Marilyn Brett
